song.title: Hot coffee and shiny donuts (.. with Caustic 3 for Android)
song.info:
Second place on Gerp 2014's Wild Music Compo. Completely made with Caustic 3 for Android.
Lyrics:
Digital artwork forever can't be cliché Demoscene movement won't be passé All we need is friendship and creativity And some compos to show our ability
We are making demos all night long Pixeling graphics that comes along Making music for moving phong Pushing code never seen so strong
Pitiful ones says "get out of the past!" They claim "yesterday won't be a blast! " "If you do things for free you're untoward!" "Having fun is not enough of reward!"
Music for moving phong Code never seen so strong
Digital artwork forever can't be cliché DemoScene movement won't be passé All we need is friendship and creativity And some compos to show our ability
We know it's hard to understand our goal A culture based on this nerdy binary soul Though there's something wise sceners knows It's true: only lamers to LAN parties goes
Only lamers to LAN parties goes (repeated several times)

link.comment: Inside Caustic 3 look of the tune
